sentences.en: After allowing the virus to infect the eggs, the team fertilized them with normal cat sperm and injected them into the fallopian tubes of 22 female cats.
sentences.cn: 病毒感染卵细胞之后，小组用正常猫精子使卵细胞受精，并且把这些受精卵注入22只雌性猫的输卵管中。

sentences.en: But why should a molecule found on fertilized eggs release such fury?
sentences.cn: 但是为什么受精卵上的分子可以造成如此的愤怒。

sentences.en: Caviar is a luxury delicacy, consisting of processed, salted, non - fertilized sturgeon roe.
sentences.cn: 鱼子酱是一种珍羞美味, 是用盐腌过的未受精的鲟鱼卵加工制成.

sentences.en: Derived from two separately fertilized eggs . Used especially of fraternal twins.
sentences.cn: 二卵双胞胎是源于两个分开的受精卵的.

sentences.en: Embryo: A plant or animal as it develops from a fertilized egg.
sentences.cn: 胚胎 — 由受精卵发育而成的植物或动物.

sentences.en: Flowers are often fertilized by bees as they gather nectar.
sentences.cn: 花常在蜜蜂采蜜时受粉。

sentences.en: Frequently the basal ovule, which is the last one to be fertilized would abort.
sentences.cn: 最后受精的基生胚珠经常败育.

sentences.en: He nursed the flowers in his garden and fertilized them regularly.
sentences.cn: 他小心呵护花园里的花,并按时给他们施肥.

sentences.en: If these eggs are then fertilized , they may , course, produce multiple pregnancies.
sentences.cn: 如果这些卵子都受精, 当然就可能产生多胞胎.

sentences.en: Literary studies have been cross - fertilized by new ideas in linguistics.
sentences.cn: 文学研究从语言学方面的新见解中受益良多.

sentences.en: Monozygotic twins - Twins resulting from the division of a fertilized egg.
sentences.cn: 同卵双胞胎 - 双城造成司受精卵.

sentences.en: Pregnancy begins when the fertilized egg is implanted in the wall of the uterus.
sentences.cn: 当受精卵植入子宫壁时，妊娠就开始了。

sentences.en: That could mean munching on live sea horses or hard-boiled fertilized duck eggs — though steering clear of adulterated chicken breasts.
sentences.cn: 那可意味着大声咀嚼生海马或是煮过熟了的已受精鸭蛋，虽然避开了掺入次级品的鸡胸肉。

sentences.en: The fertilized eggs are taken from the cow five or six days later.
sentences.cn: 五六天以后,便可以从母牛体内取出受精卵.

sentences.en: The fertilized ovule becomes the seed , and the ovary becomes the fruit.
sentences.cn: 已受精的卵子成为种子，而子房变成了果实。

sentences.en: The fertilized ovule becomes the seed, and the ovary becomes the fruit.
sentences.cn: 已受精的卵子成为种子, 而子房变成了果实.

sentences.en: The study of psychology has recently been widely cross-fertilized by new discoveries in genetics.
sentences.cn: 心理学研究最近从遗传学的新发现中受益匪浅。

sentences.en: This made no sense. All the eggs are fertilized already.
sentences.cn: 这可说不通，因为所有的卵都已经受精了。

sentences.en: To have two fertilized and come out different colors, less common still.
sentences.cn: 有两个受精卵并且出现不同的颜色更为少见.

sentences.en: Two days later, they implanted the fertilized eggs back inside me.
sentences.cn: 两天以后，他们把受精卵重新植入了我的体内。

trans.tran_cn: 施肥( fertilize的过去式和过去分词 )
